page.title: 17 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In a recent survey of Sherbrook school children concerning the employment of their fathers it was found that 10% were employed in the primary sector as coal miners, 15% were employed in the secondary sector as mechanics and builders and 75% were employed in tertiary sector, covering the full range of service industries. Cannock District Council is anxious to help young people to find employment and have therefore established many local schemes which provide valuable experience for school leavers. Unfortunately, 22% of the population of Cannock are unemployed however, the area has a lot to offer the potential mployer(see page 8 ) and Cannock Council is encouraging industrial growth.
